name: Cartoon Clash!
description:
Version: Public Beta

-- Summary --

A 2-player competitive game featuring Disney Channel cartoon characters (More characters to be added later in updates, may later expand beyond Disney Channel characters to all cartoons)

-- How to Play --

Move around the screen and collect orbs, the player with the most orbs at the end wins.

-- Player 1 Controls --

WASD - Move

E - Super

-- Player 2 Controls --

Arrow Keys - Move

M - Super

Scratch Version works better but might be laggy https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/723247481/
